Text.Name: Text
Text.Description: Text scenarios are designed to help you generate, summarize, chat, translate, grammar check, paraphrase, analyze sentiment, and more with local language models.

GenerateText.Name: Generate Text
GenerateText.Description: Generate text with local language model.

SummarizeText.Name: Summarize Text
SummarizeText.Description: Summarize text with local language model.

TranslateText.Name: Translate Text
TranslateText.Description: Translate text with local language model.

GrammarCheckText.Name: Grammar Check
GrammarCheckText.Description: Grammar check text with local language model.

ParaphraseText.Name: Paraphrase Text
ParaphraseText.Description: Paraphrase text with local language model.

AnalyzeSentimentText.Name: Analyze Text Sentiment
AnalyzeSentimentText.Description: Analyze text sentiment with local language model.

CustomParameters.Name: Custom Parameters
CustomParameters.Description: Generate text with a local language model with custom parameters

ContentModeration.Name: Content Moderation
ContentModeration.Description: Prompt a local language model with safety checks in place

SemanticSearch.Name: Semantic Search
SemanticSearch.Description: Semantically search text with a local embeddings model.

RetrievalAugmentedGeneration.Name: Retrieval Augmented Generation
RetrievalAugmentedGeneration.Description: Use existing data to improve responses given by a local language model.

SmartControls.Name: Smart Controls
SmartControls.Description: Smart controls scenarios are designed to help you perform common language model actions within a text box control, smart paste text with local language model, and suggest ComboBox options semantically with an embeddings model.

SmartTextBox.Name: Smart Text Box
SmartTextBox.Description: Perform common language model actions within a text box control.

SmartPaste.Name: Smart Paste
SmartPaste.Description: Smart paste text with local language model.

SemanticComboBox.Name: Semantic Combo Box
SemanticComboBox.Description: Suggest ComboBox options semantically with an embeddings model.

Code.Name: Code
Code.Description: Code scenarios are designed to help you generate, explain, and analyze code with local language models.

GenerateCode.Name: Generate Code
GenerateCode.Description: Generate code with a local language model.

ExplainCode.Name: Explain Code
ExplainCode.Description: Explain code with a local language model.

Image.Name: Image
Image.Description: Image scenarios are designed to help you generate, describe, classify, detect objects, detect human poses, enhance, and segment images with local models.

GenerateImage.Name: Generate Image
GenerateImage.Description: Generate high quality images from text.

DescribeImage.Name: Describe Image
DescribeImage.Description: Describe image with a multimodal language model

ClassifyImage.Name: Classify Image
ClassifyImage.Description: Image classification models give their best guess at the main object of a given photo.

DetectObjects.Name: Detect Objects
DetectObjects.Description: Object detection models detect items in a photo and give you their locations and associated confidence.

DetectPose.Name: Detect Human Pose
DetectPose.Description: Models in this scenario will detect human poses and posture.

DetectPoses.Name: Detect Multiple Human Poses
DetectPoses.Description: Models in this scenario will detect human poses and posture.

EnhanceImage.Name: Enhance Image
EnhanceImage.Description: Image enhancing models will upscale low resolution images improving their clarity.

SegmentImage.Name: Segment Image
SegmentImage.Description: Models in this scenario will segment images into different regions.

AudioAndVideo.Name: Audio and Video
AudioAndVideo.Description: Audio and video scenarios are designed to help you transcribe, translate, and summarize audio and video with local models.

TranslateAudio.Name: Translate Audio or Video
TranslateAudio.Description: Simple audio translation to English with Whisper.
